name.ja: <ruby>撃<rt>げき</rt></ruby><ruby>鉄<rt>てつ</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>リンドブルム

text.en:
"Fallen of Albaz" + 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast monster
When a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster's effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then you can return 1 monster on the field to the hand. During your opponent's turn, if this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Fallen of Albaz" in your GY; if both are still in your GY, Special Summon either that monster or this card, and if you do, banish the other. You can only use each effect of "Lindwurm the Gunhammer Dragon" once per turn.

materials: "Fallen of Albaz" + 1 Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast-Type monster
